title: Random Book Contest: Just Stick It In ; Edition

embed.description: The official login screen for Neeko, the Curious Chameleon. Neeko Available Now - https://riot.com/2DZXW6V Champion Reveal: Neeko - https://riot.com/2Uk7oI6

body:
_**1. Choose a Book
2. Stick Your Finger In
3. Open The Book
4. Post The Sentence Your Finger Is On**_
_**5. Have a GREAT friday!**_

{{sticker:poppy-wink}}
